content: the coastal sun hat is fun quick pattern that s not only perfect for the beach but any outdoor activity it s worked top down in continuous rounds aside from the mesh section this pattern is advanced beginner it is a one size fits most finished size brim width- approx 15 head circumference- 23 yarn worsted weight medium 4 hobby lobby i love this cotton 160-175 yds you will need to know how to do basic crochet sts chain- chain double_crochet- double_crochet increase- increase 2 single_crochet in same st single_crochet- single_crochet slip_stitch- slip_stitch materials hook us j/6 0 mm the pattern includes written pattern materials needed for project terminology guide photo tutorial thank you for purchasing my pattern i hope you enjoyed making it as much as i did this is an original pattern by jessica paz creates please do not sell reprint or repost any parts of this pattern you are welcome to sell your finished items but please link back to me so others who are interested may enjoy my pattern as well if you re on instagram tag me @jessicapazcreates and/or use hashtag #jessicapazcreates or #coastalsunhat so i can see your finished project if you have any questions please feel free to contact me *all sales are final on patterns *
